articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Ulterior Motive of Anti-DPRK False Propaganda Disclosed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Ulterior Motive of Anti-DPRK False Propaganda Disclosed
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group is deliberately spreading misinformation about the north these days through the "Chongwadae," the "Intelligence Service," the "Ministry of National Defense," the "Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade," the "Ministry of Unification" and other institutions. 
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea released its information bulletin No. 950 on Friday refuting the false propaganda.
					
					 It says: The group of traitors is now leaving no means untried to spread misinformation about the north in a bid to build up public opinion. It is letting media use such misinformation as "the north's preparations for a missile launch", "restarting nuclear facilities" and "stockpile of ammunition".  It is also making phone calls to "legislators" to let them know about the above-said misinformation. 
					
					 The unprecedented much fuss made by the Lee group about "information about the north" was prompted by its wicked and foolish attempt to calm down the anti-Lee Myung Bak resentment of people from all walks of life which has reached the point of eruption in the wake of the death of the former "president" in south Korea, get rid of a tight corner and justify the fascist suppression of the forces supporting the June 15 joint declaration under the pretext of "security," the information bulletin notes, and goes on:
					
					 The secretariat vehemently denounces the Lee group's opening of "information about the north" as another vicious anti-DPRK racket to incite the consciousness of confrontation with the DPRK in south Korea, build up public opinion on "security crisis" in a bid to weather the ruling crisis and justify its moves for confrontation and war against fellow countrymen.
					
					 The Lee group is sadly mistaken if it thinks it can get rid of the abyss of ruin through false propaganda aimed at inciting the confrontation with fellow countrymen and red herring.
					
					 The Lee group had better make an apology before the nation for its crimes against the nation, people and reunification and immediately step down without delay instead of working hard to prolong its despicable remaining days through such mean and nefarious anti-DPRK ruckus.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Touted "Story about Counterfeit Money" Rebuked
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Touted "Story about Counterfeit Money" Rebuked
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Friday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA refuting the racket kicked up by the south Korean puppets against the DPRK over the "story of counterfeit money," pursuant to the U.S. policy: 
					 The right-wing conservative media in south Korea including "Dong-A Ilbo" are floating stories that in November last year the Pusan local police office uncovered and arrested four south Koreans who tried to circulate counterfeit 100 U.S. dollar notes after smuggling them into south Korea from China and the investigation resulted in clearly proving that those were counterfeited in the north.
					
					 Meanwhile, the puppets and the intelligence authorities of the U.S. are spreading the fiction, claiming that they agreed to tighten the watch over China and other countries where "counterfeit money" is in circulation in order to check the smuggling of "the north's counterfeit money" and to intercept the shipment of various materials which can be used for counterfeiting.
					
					 The "story about counterfeiting" was concocted by the Bush administration in the past in a bid to justify the financial sanctions against the DPRK. But when the story turned out to be a plot of the CIA it became a laughing stock of the world and the U.S. stopped talking about it any longer as it was nothing but a poor scenario with neither plausibility nor evidence.
					
					 As widely known to the world, it is south Korea and the U.S. where counterfeit money is openly circulated and all sorts of irregularities and swindles are rampant.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the puppets, in league with the U.S., revived the outdated anti-DPRK scenario which had been thrown into the dumping ground after its true nature was brought to light. This only reveals the deplorable position of those forces hostile to the DPRK in which they find themselves, much upset by their failure to seek a pretext for imposing additional "sanctions" against the DPRK over its just measure for bolstering up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group would be well advised to stop peddling the U.S. hackneyed scenario that can convince no one so that it may not suffer bitter shame and confess to all cases of irregularities and corruption.

articles.title: Greetings to Russian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Russian President
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev, President of Russia, on Friday on its national day.
					 Expressing the belief that the DPRK-Russia relationship would develop in the spirit of the inter-state treaties and the joint declarations agreed between the two countries, Kim in the message wished the president success in his work for stability and development of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Russian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Russian PM
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, Prime Minister of Russia, on Friday on its national day.
					Expressing the belief that the cooperative relations between the two countries would develop in the common interests of the two peoples, Kim wished the Prime Minister success in his work for the socio-economic development.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Indian Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Indian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Zile Singh, Indian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell visit to him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: National Day of Russia Marked
articles.content:
National Day of Russia Marked
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception on Thursday to mark the national day of the Russian Federation.
					 Present at the reception on invitation were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Kung Sok Ung, Vice-Minister of Railways Jang Tok Yong and Vice-Minister of Culture Han Chol of the DPRK, diplomatic envoys of different countries and members of missions of international organizations here.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy and Russian guests were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Fallen Fighters of Soviet Army
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Staff members of the Russian embassy here laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on Friday on the occasion of its national day.
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to fallen fighters of the Soviet Army after placing the wreath in the name of the Russian embassy.
					
					 They also laid a wreath and bunches of flowers before a cemetery of fallen fighters of the Soviet Army in Sadong District, Pyongyang.

articles.title: DPRK Wins Gold Medal in Judo World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Wins Gold Medal in Judo World Cup
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Chol Su of the DPRK won the 73 kg division of the 2009 Judo World Cup held in Romania.
					 Other Korean judoists bagged three bronze medals in the 66 kg and 60 kg divisions.

articles.title: Work Brisk to Protect and Propagate Aquatic Resources
articles.content:
Work Brisk to Protect and Propagate Aquatic Resources
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- A work to protect and propagate aquatic resources is making brisk headway at the Office for Stocking the River Songchon with Fishes of the DPRK.
					 It built a salmon hatchery and has since successfully solved scientific and technical issues arising in breeding salmons.
					
					 The officials, workers and technicians there have conducted an effective work for collecting and hatching spawns to suit the ecological characteristics of salmon, while making a deep-going study of the quality of water in the river, places for spawning and its period, etc. and, on this basis, have energetically pushed ahead with the work for propagating salmon. 
					
					 It also succeeded in studying and introducing quality assorted feed, making it possible to more effectively breed young salmons. It is successfully conducting the work to protect salmons in close touch with the institution concerned. 
					
					 The young salmons bred at the office are now finding their way to the East Sea.

articles.title: Korea, Home of Insam
articles.content:
Korea, Home of Insam
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Korea is widely known to the world as the home of Insam (ginseng).
					 The Korean ancestors not only found Insam thousands of years ago and used it for the prevention and treatment of diseases but also developed its cultivation and processing techniques.
					
					 It had been called Sincho and Soncho meaning that it is a mysterious herb and then called Thojong meaning that it carries the spirit and energy of fertile soil and Hyolsam meaning that it is a grass root which recuperates human blood.
					
					 Later it came to be called Insam as it had the human shape and it was a root preventing and treating all diseases. 
					
					 It was known to be a specially efficacious medicinal herb from the period of three kingdoms (Koguryo, Paekje and Silla) and used as the best haematic tonic in the period of Koryo and Ri Dynasty.
					
					 The people of Koguryo knew that Insam was efficacious for chronic gastritis and gastric ulcer. A book of mid-seventh century "Chongumyobang" tells us that it was used as a medicine.
					
					 A Chinese book written 1,500 years ago introduces Insam of Koguryo as a very efficacious root and it carries "Song of Insam".
					
					 In Koguryo in the mid-first century B.C. young wild Insam was transplanted and cultivated and the seed of wild Insam was collected and cultivated under trees of mountain areas. With experiences accumulated, Insam cultivation was moved to crop fields in the period of Koryo. 
					
					 Insam growers in the eleventh and twelfth centuries turned Songdo (Kaesong), the capital of Koryo, into an area of large-scale Insam cultivation, finding it to be a proper soil.
					
					 Thus the area became the center of Insam traffic and its trade with neighboring countries began to show life.
					
					 Today Insam is not only famous as a mysterious medicine for the cure of all diseases and eternal youth and longevity but also is widely used to retard the aging of skin and add beauty and to prevent various skin diseases and loss of hair by being added to cosmetics and others.

articles.title: Brilliant Life of Ardent Revolutionary
articles.content:
Brilliant Life of Ardent Revolutionary
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The life of an indomitable revolutionary fighter Kim Chol Ju is shinning with boundless loyalty to revolution, ardent love for the country and people, unyielding fighting spirit and staunch will.
					He, born on June 12, Juche 5 (1916), left Mangyongdae, his hometown in his early years, following his parents who carved out the road of rigorous struggle. He keenly experienced the grief and misfortune of a ruined nation in Linjiang, Badaogou, Fusong and other areas and bore deep in his heart burning hatred and spirit of resistance against the Japanese imperialists.
					
					Bereaved of his father in his early days, he cherished the firm faith that it was the only way of achieving the liberation of the country to uphold the revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and became a core member of the Saenal Children's Union formed by the President to closely rally many children with his prominent artistic attainments and brisk political activities.
					
					True to the line of armed struggle put forward by the President, he waged a vigorous struggle to seize the enemy's arms and thus did much toward the preparation for founding the anti-Japanese guerrilla army.
					
					He also led many Young Communist League members to join the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and volunteered the difficult work with the Chinese nationalist anti-Japanese units and did it tactfully.+
					
					He, with warm love for the people, saved the people from the perilous state at the risk of his life by luring the Japanese imperialist "punitive" force to himself when the enemy surprised the guerrilla zone.
					
					He displayed unrivalled bravery in the Fuerhe Battle and many other battles.
					
					The noble life of Kim Chol Ju who dedicated his all to the sacred cause for the motherland and nation will be conveyed along with the history of the Korean revolution shinning with Songun.

articles.title: Death of Roh Moo Hyun Termed Political Terrorism
articles.content:
Death of Roh Moo Hyun Termed Political Terrorism
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The death of former "president" of south Korea Roh Moo Hyun was a politically motivated premeditated and deliberate terror and shuddering murder committed by the pro-U.S. conservative forces of south Korea according to their despicable scenario for politically motivated retaliation.
					  Rodong Sinmun today observes this in a signed commentary. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the case was neither mere revenge of those "in power" upon those who "lost power" nor the murder prompted by hostility towards Roh.
					
					 The case was an unprecedentedly brutal action and a hideous anti-reunification fascist man-killing farce intended to suppress and eliminate the forces struggling to achieve national independence and reunification through alliance with the north and scrap the historic October 4 declaration. The Lee Myung Bak group dealt a politically fatal blow at the man who signed the declaration and thus forced him to commit a suicide, bringing to light once again its traitorous act of denying the declaration and ambition for confrontation with fellow countrymen contrary to national reconciliation and unity and independent reunification.
					
					 Now people's indignation and grudge against the Lee group of traitors are towering in south Korea in the wake of the death of the former "president." South Korean people from all walks of life are unanimous in saying that the death of Roh was "a politically motivated murder by the Lee Myung Bak regime" and "de facto death caused by torture" and strongly demand traitor Lee make an apology for it and call for "wholesale resignation of the Cabinet" and "investigation into the state administration."
					
					 With no sleight of hand can the Lee Myung Bak group evade the responsibility for the tragic death nor can it bar the resentment of the people from developing into all-people resistance.
					
					 The Lee group will surely have to pay dearly for its unprecedented crimes.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Outbursts Flailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Outbursts Flailed
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The pro-U.S. ultra-right conservatives including those of the Grand National Party of south Korea at a recent "meeting of lawmakers" were so foolish as to urge the authorities to take "resolute counteraction," not content with pulling up the DPRK with a hue and cry over the "worst security crisis after the June 25 war" and "reckless provocation," etc.
					 Minju Joson Friday in a signed commentary dismisses this as a renewed farce of anti-DPRK confrontational maniacs to hoodwink the people and mislead the public opinion.
					
					 The "worst security crisis after the June 25 war" touted by the GNP gentries was caused by traitor Lee Myung Bak and pro-U.S. conservatives and their loudmouthed "reckless provocation" and "resolute counteraction" only remind one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!", the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 It is not without any reason that the GNP gentries are persisting in the racket for confrontation with the DPRK which can convince no one.  The Lee group seeks to shift the blame for the present situation caused by its treacherous and anti-reunification moves on to the DPRK side and quench the people's anti-"government" sentiment through the above-said ruckus at any cost.
					
					 The Lee group is, indeed, a group of ferocious traitors as it leaves no means untried to incite confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 No matter what rhetoric the group may make, telling sheer lies, no one will be taken in by it. 
					
					 Every sin brings its punishment with it and the group of traitors can never tide over its ruling crisis, its own make. 
					
					 The Lee group's above-said racket will only lead to shameless ruin.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun today devotes a signed article to the 20th anniversary of the publication of the work of General Secretary Kim Jong Il "Let Us Strengthen the Party and Increase Its Leadership Role".
					 Kim Jong Il in his work laid bare the anti-party and counter-revolutionary nature of the revisionists and reformists and clarified the principled matters arising in further strengthening the party and enhancing its leading role as required by the changed environment. 
					
					 The past two decades covered by the Korean revolution since the publication of the work represent an immortal history of Songun revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il who opened a new chapter for the victory of socialism and laid an eternal foundation for building a great prosperous and powerful nation by developing the Workers' Party of Korea into an eternal party of President Kim Il Sung and a guiding force of Songun cause, the article says, and goes on:
					
					  Kim Jong Il's great leadership lies in that he made sure that the whole party was modeled on the monolithic idea, Songun idea, and built up the ranks of the party into invincible vanguard ranks replete with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader and made the revolutionary work method, fighting traits and work style of the People's Army prevail throughout the party.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has successfully carried forward the Songun idea of Kim Il Sung and steadily developed the idea in depth with new principles and contents and made great efforts to steadily develop in depth the Songun idea while imbuing the whole party with it.
					
					 Now the Songun idea serves as unshakable guidelines for the WPK's construction and activities. It is its true picture that all its members act, guided by the will of Songun and advance in the spirit of Songun in any storm and stress. 
					
					 Under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il a dynamic drive has been waged to learn from the fighting traits and work style of the People's Army, establishing strong revolutionary discipline and order throughout the party and making it possible to conduct the party's ideological work and all the political work the way done on the frontline and in an offensive way.
					
					 All the Party organizations, officials and Party members should steadily glorify the immortal leadership exploits performed by Kim Jong Il in the cause of Party construction in the era of Songun and fulfil their mission and vanguard role in the on-going general offensive to win a final victory in the drive for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Large Anti-"Government" Rallies Held across S. Korea
articles.content:
Large Anti-"Government" Rallies Held across S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Large anti-"government" rallies took place across south Korea on June 10 on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of the June Popular Resistance. 
					 The rallies brought together more than 300,000 members of civic and public organizations and opposition parties, workers, peasants, students, women, intellectuals, media persons and others. 
					
					 An "all-people rally for inheriting the June resistance and restoring democracy" was held in the plaza of the Seoul City Office with at least 150,000 people from all walks of life attending. They were holding in their hands candlelight and slogan boards reading "Regime of man-killers, step down," etc.  
					
					 Speakers said at the rally that the Lee Myung Bak regime has pursued a fascist dictatorial rule, violating democracy, since he came to power, calling upon all of the people to turn out in the struggle to root out the poisonous plants through the second June resistance. 
					
					 The rally issued the "four-point demand for restoring democracy," i.e. a stop to the strong-arm rule and policy favoring big businesses and the moves to enact evil laws for violating democracy, deteriorating people's living and abusing human rights and actions to make a switchover in the "state administration" and improve the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 Then a resolution was read out. It warned that if Lee persists in reinforcing his unilateral fascist dictatorial rule despite of the demand of the people from all walks of life, they will wage a sustained widespread people's resistance movement. 
					
					  The resolution said that as an immediate task they would stage an all-people signature campaign till July 10 to have the "four-point demand" met. 
					
					 At the end of the rally, the participants staged a demonstration. 
					
					 Prior to the rally, various organizations including the Council for Inheriting the June Resistance and Restoring Democracy, the People's Council for Livelihood and Democracy and the Joint Council of Civic and Public Organizations held a meeting to commemorate the 22nd anniversary of the June Popular Resistance at which they called upon all the progressive movement organizations to carry on the struggle for achieving democracy and the country's reunification. 
					
					 An "appeal to the people" was read out at the meeting. 
					
					 On the same day, anti-"government" rallies were held in Pusan, Taejon, Kwangju, Taegu and other places. 
					
					 In another development, the Student Committee of the  Democratic Labor Party on June 6 issued an appeal calling upon the students to unite and take the lead in the struggle to judge the dictatorship and the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Action Headquarters of the 17th-term south Korean Federation of University Councils on June 7 and the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification on June 9 issued statements calling upon all the people to turn out in the struggle to judge the Lee dictatorial regime and achieve the country's reunification. 
					
					 The movement for issuing declarations on the situation denouncing the Lee group of traitors is gaining in scope and strength in different parts of south Korea on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of the June Popular Resistance.

articles.title: Action against Conservative Media Launched in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action against Conservative Media Launched in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- More than 600 civic and public organizations in south Korea, including the People's Movement for the Sovereignty of Media Subscribers and the People's Council for Livelihood and Democracy, on Monday turned out in the campaign against conservative media subservient to the "government" of traitors.
					 They called a joint press conference outside the Chosun Ilbo, declaring that they would launch a campaign of boycotting the products of a business related to the conservative newspapers.
					
					 Speakers at the conference stated that this business has been designated as the primary target of their struggle as it is busy ordering ads on conservative Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo and Dong-A Ilbo.
					
					 They warned that the spearhead of the campaign would be also directed to other businesses ordering ads on those conservative newspapers.
					
					 The campaign will last till an end is put to ordering ads on those newspapers, they declared.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak "government" is still hell-bent on the crackdown on those involved in last year's campaign of boycotting the conservative newspapers, branding it "as illegal" but the organizations will launch a new indomitable struggle against it, they stated.

articles.title: Formation of Students Solidarity Proposed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Formation of Students Solidarity Proposed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- Eight student organizations and the general student councils of 23 universities in south Korea, including the Federation of University Students in the 21st Century called a press conference in Seoul on Tuesday, proposing to form an organization for joint action of university students demanding the resignation of traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					 They noted that many university professors are now conducting the campaign for announcing declarations on the situation to achieve democracy, as in the days of the June resistance in 1987, and people from all walks of life are turning out in such vigorous actions as vowing the second June resistance.
					
					 University students have always stood in the van of the struggle remolding society, they said, calling upon the students to fully display their youthful stamina in the struggle for forcing the treacherous "government" to resign.
					
					 They expressed their resolution to wage a more vigorous struggle by organizing an "action solidarity of university students for resignation of Lee Myung Bak and restoration of democracy."

articles.title: Signature Campaign Launched in Finland
articles.content:
Signature Campaign Launched in Finland
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- "A signature campaign for supporting the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea" was launched under the co-sponsorship of the Finnish Communists' Association and the Finland-Korea Society.
					 A ceremony of declaring the signature campaign took place in Helsinki on June 3. 
					
					 Antti Sika-Aho, chairman of the society, in his speech made at the ceremony condemned the Lee Myung Bak conservative authorities of south Korea for pursuing the policy of confrontation with the DPRK in collusion with foreign forces in violation of the declarations adopted between the north and the south, driving the inter-Korean relations into total collapse.
					
					 The Lee conservative authorities should properly understand the importance of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for putting it into practice, as they were provided by the top leaders of the north and the south, unconditionally implement them and immediately roll back the hostile policy toward the DPRK, he urged. 
					
					 The proposal for achieving the country's reunification advanced by President Kim Il Sung is the most reasonable and fair and aboveboard one, he pointed out, calling for staging the said signature campaign till June 15, 2010, the 10th anniversary of the publication of the historic North-South Joint Declaration. 
					
					 He urged the U.S. to withdraw its armed forces from south Korea at once and let the Korean people independently and peacefully solve the Korean problem by their own efforts in their interests.

articles.title: Punishment of Lee Myung Bak Regime Urged
articles.content:
Punishment of Lee Myung Bak Regime Urged
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Joint Secretariat, the Overseas Headquarters, headquarters of Koreans in Japan and China and European, U.S. and Canadian regional headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) released statements and articles on June 7 and 8 to the memory of Kang Hui Nam, honorary chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon.
					 The statements and articles referred to the fact that Kang Hui Nam killed himself in protest against the anti-reunification and fascist moves of the Lee Myung Bak regime in south Korea.
					
					 They denounced the anti-reunification moves of the Lee regime suppressing the patriotic activities of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon as the last-ditch effort of those impressed with the ruling crisis.
					
					 Saying that civic and public organizations, religionists, media persons and university professors in south Korea rose up in a large-scale anti-"government" struggle on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of the June Popular Resistance, they called upon all Koreans to turn out in the struggle for punishing the pro-U.S. Lee Myung Bak regime and achieving independence, democracy and reunification.

articles.title: Punishment of Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Demanded
articles.content:
Punishment of Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Demanded
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. issued a statement on June 7 in demand of punishment of the murderous Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					 The statement noted that Kang Hui Nam, honorary chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, killed himself in protest against the Lee fascist dictatorial regime on June 6.
					
					 The June Popular Resistance was a mass struggle for standing against the military fascist dictatorial rule and achieving democracy, the statement said, calling for an all-people resistance to punish the regime of traitors that has totally denied the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The Society for Cooperation among  Koreans in Germany, too, released a statement on the same day saying that Kang offered his life to protest the tyranny of the dictatorial regime which stamped out democracy, totally denied the said declarations and drove the inter-Korean relations to the worst crisis, the brink of war.
					
					 The blame for the tragic present situation is entirely on traitor Lee Myung Bak, the statement said, warning that the people's anger would burst into fiercer flame if the traitor continues resorting to the high-handed rule consistent with fascist dictatorship.
					
					 It declared that overseas Koreans, too, would vigorously turn out in the struggle to put an end to the Lee dictatorial regime.

articles.title: Support for Korea's Reunification Expressed
articles.content:
Support for Korea's Reunification Expressed
 Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Indonesian Marine Transport Trade Union released a statement on June 5 on the occasion of the 9th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The statement said that the adoption of the joint declaration opened up the June 15 era of reunification in which the movement for Korea's reunification advances along the track of national independence, a new era for achieving the independent reunification through reconciliation and cooperation between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 After the publication of the declaration antagonism and confrontation between the north and the south turned into the relations of dialogue, cooperation and exchange, it noted.
					
					 It further said:
					
					 The history of the reunification movement in the Korean Peninsula proves the truth that the relations between the north and the south can advance in a reunification-oriented manner to meet the interests of the nation when they respect and faithfully implement the joint declaration in the spirit of "By our nation itself".
					
					 But the present south Korean authorities are staging with the U.S. joint military exercises aimed at all-out attack on the DPRK and driving the inter-Korean relations into confrontation.
					
					 I am firmly convinced that Korea's reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, will be realized without fail when all Koreans sincerely implement the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Bulletin on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Released
articles.content:
Bulletin on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Released
Pyongyang, June 12 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea published its bulletin No. 37 "For the People" on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Recalling that June 19, 1964 is the day Kim Jong Il started working  at the C.C., the WPK, the bulletin said that the nearly half a century-long history of his leadership over the Party is one showing the personality of a genuine statesman serving the people. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the leader pursuing the policy of love and trust in the people, the bulletin noted, adding that his loving care for the people reaches everywhere they live and all treasures and creations of the country are closely associated with it. 
					
					 Citing facts to prove the boundless loving care shown by him for the people, the bulletin continued:  
					
					 He is a model of popular leaders as he is totally dedicated to the people.
					
					 He deems it as his lifelong mission and noble cause to devote himself to the people and regards it as the greatest pleasure to dedicate his all to them. 
					
					 His personality as a genuine popular leader can find its manifestation in the slogan "We Serve the People!" put up by him.

articles.title: Ambas partes de Corea se reunen para enmendar contrato de la ZIK
articles.content:
Ambas partes de Corea se reunen para enmendar contrato de la ZIK
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 11 en Kaesong el contacto de trabajo entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea para la enmienda del contrato de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong (ZIK).
					  En la ocasion la parte Norte expreso su preocupacion de que cayeron en la coyuntura de ruptura las relaciones Norte-Sur, que se desarrollaban favorablemente despues de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, y de que afronta la grave crisis hasta la ZIK, simbolo del 15 de Junio.
					
					  Expuso la posicion de principios y las propuestas detalladas para mejorar las labores de esa zona conforme a las cambiadas relaciones N-S y a las condiciones reales.
					
					  Puesto que fueron denegadas totalmente las historicas declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur, se elimino la razon de seguir dando vigencia a las medidas prerrogativas concedidas segun el espiritu de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", he aqui el motivo de nuestra peticion sobre la revision y la renegociacion de los asuntos de la ZIK, enfatizo la parte Norte.
					
					 Llamo la atencion al hecho de que en la ZIK muchas empresas surcoreanas obtienen fabulosas ganancias y, en contraste, la parte Norte no cobra debidamente el arriendo de la tierra de esta zona, el salario de sus trabajadores, los impuestos, etc.
					
					 Y planteo el proyecto de enmienda en cuanto al arriendo de la tierra, el salario, los impuestos y otras cosas de la ZIK.
					
					  Igualmente, para la normalizacion de los trabajos de la ZIK, exigio por ahora a la parte Sur que impulse con urgencia la construccion del albergue, la guarderia y la carretera de ida y vuelta del trabajo para los trabajadores nortenos, etc., segun lo acordado ya.
					
					  La parte Norte expreso la voluntad de garantizar adicionalmente el numero del personal permanente, el transito y otras gestiones de las empresas nuevamente inauguradas en la ZIK en el mismo nivel que las ya enclavadas.
					
					La posicion de principios y las propuestas expuestas esta vez reflejan correctamente las actuales relaciones Norte-Sur y la situacion de la ZIK y devienen la muestra del sincero esfuerzo por la normalizacion de los trabajos de esta zona, asevero y enfatizo que la parte Sur debe ponerse de acuerdo con ellas.
					
					  Acto seguido, hizo uso de la palabra la parte Sur.
					
					 En el contacto hubo debates de las propuestas de la parte Norte.
					
					 Ambas partes coincidieron en celebrar el dia 19 el proximo contacto de trabajo.

articles.title: CRPP critica la difusion de "informaciones del Norte"
articles.content:
CRPP critica la difusion de "informaciones del Norte"
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ATCC) -- En relacion con que en estos tiempos, la banda de Lee Myung Bak difunde malintencionadamente las mentirosas "informaciones del Norte de Corea" por conducto de "Chongwadae" (casa azul), el "Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia", el "Ministerio de Defensa Nacional", el "Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y Comercio", el "Ministerio de Reunificacion" y otras instituciones, el secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 12 la informacion No. 950 que sigue.
					La banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak difunde a traves de la prensa los supuestos "preparativos para el lanzamiento de misil", la "reanudacion de la operacion de instalaciones nucleares", el "almacenamiento de municiones en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y otros datos y los notifica directamente por telefono a los "parlamentarios".
					
					Ademas, utiliza otros metodos para crear la opinion publica sobre las "informaciones del Norte".
					
					Esta inusitada y escandalosa campana partio de la siniestra y necia intencion de esa camarilla de salir del atolladero al aplacar el animo de luchar contra Lee Myung Bak de los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores, que esta a punto de explosion con motivo del fallecimiento del ex "presidente", y justificar la represion fascista a las fuerzas partidarias de la Declaracion Conjunta 15 de Junio pretextando la "seguridad".
					
					El Secretariado del CRPP denuncia categoricamente esa demagogia calificandola de otra brutal campana intrigante contra la RPDC, que libra la pandilla de Lee para salir de su crisis de gobernacion y justificar sus actos en pro de la confrontacion fratricida y la guerra al fomentar en el Sur de Corea la conciencia conflictiva con la RPDC y crear la opinion publica sobre la "seguridad en crisis".
					
					Estaria muy equivocada esa horda si piensa que podria evitar la ruina mediante esa desinformacion para enganar al pueblo.
					
					Le convendria mas retirarse ahora mismo del "poder" tras pedir disculpas por sus crimenes antinacionales, antipopulares y anti-reunificacion que mantener su sucia vida recurriendo a esa pueril y sucia campana de intriga anti-RPDC.

articles.title: CRPP desmiente rumor anti-RPDC que difunde banda de Myung Bak
articles.content:
CRPP desmiente rumor anti-RPDC que difunde banda de Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ATCC) -- En una rueda de prensa concedida con la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea con motivo de que los titeres surcoreanos lanzan, al servicio de Estados Unidos, otra campana intrigante contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea difundiendo el supuesto "rumor de billetes falsificados", el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) respondio el dia 12 como lo siguiente:
					 En estos dias, el periodico "Dong-a Ilbo" y otros medios de prensa derechistas del Sur de Corea reportan que en noviembre del ano pasado, la Agencia de la Policia Local de Pusan detuvo a 4 surcoreanos, quienes trataban de poner en circulacion los billetes falsificados de 100 US$ introducidos ilegalmente desde China.
					
					 Agregan que segun el resultado de la investigacion, se confirmo que esos billetes fueron hechos en el Norte de Corea.
					
					  Se hacen ecos de este rumor los titeres surcoreanos y las autoridades norteamericanas de inteligencia diciendo que con el fin de prevenir la supuesta "falsificacion de billetes en el Norte de Corea", acordaron intensificar la vigilancia a China y otros paises, donde circulan tales billetes, e impedir la entrada en el Norte de Corea de los materiales principales usables en su fabricacion.
					
					 La administracion Bush fue la que invento ese rumor fantasmal sin ninguna prueba para justificar su sancion financiera anti-RPDC.
					
					 Pero, tuvo que retractarse del polemico rumor al pasar tremenda pena en la arena internacional cuando se confirmo que eso fue otro complot inventado por la CIA.
					
					Como esta conocido por todo el mundo, el Sur de Corea y Estados Unidos son los focos de la circulacion abierta de billetes falsificados y de las acciones ilicitas y fraudulentas de todo tipo.
					
					A pesar de esto, los titeres surcoreanos vuelven a difundir esa destenida chismografia anti-RPDC en contubernio con EE.UU.
					
					Esto demuestra la pobre situacion de las fuerzas hostiles a la RPDC desesperadas por buscar el pretexto de la "sancion" con respecto a nuestras justas medidas para reforzar el disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa.
					
					Sera conveniente a la banda de Lee Myung Bak revelar los casos ilicitos y corruptos de si misma antes de que pase tremenda verguenza por repetir esa vieja marana de EE.UU. que no puede enganar a nadie.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun elogia hazanas de Kim Jong Il en direccion sobre PTC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun elogia hazanas de Kim Jong Il en direccion sobre PTC
Pyongyang, 12 de junio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del vigesimo aniversario de la publicacion de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Fortalezcamos el partido y elevemos su papel directriz", el diario Rodong Sinmun publico este viernes un articulo individual conmemorativo cuyo texto resumido sigue abajo:
					En esa obra el Dirigente revelo el atributo antipartidista y contrarrevolucionario de los revisionistas y los reformistas y aclaro los problemas de principios para fortalecer el partido y elevar su papel directriz conforme a las circunstancias en constante cambio.
					
					  En los 20 anos de la revolucion coreana desde la publicacion de esa obra se registro la cronica de la inmortal guia sobre la revolucion del Songun (priorizacion militar) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien al desarrollar el Partido del Trabajo de Corea como partido eterno del Lider y fuerzas rectoras de la causa del Songun, abrio la nueva pagina de la victoria del socialismo y echo la base de eterna duracion para la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					  La grandeza de su direccion sobre el PTC se manifiesta en que hizo homogeneizar todo el partido con la unica idea del Songun, formo a sus militantes como invencibles filas de vanguardias imbuidas del espiritu de defender al lider a costa de la vida e hizo aplicar en todo el partido el revolucionario modo de trabajo y lucha del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					  El Dirigente Kim Jong Il hizo grandes esfuerzos por dar continuidad a la idea del Songun del Presidente Kim Il Sung y la enriquecio continuamente con nuevos principios y contenidos.
					
					 Hoy en dia, la idea del Songun sirve de invariable orientacion en la construccion y las actividades del PTC, que actua y marcha en virtud de ese pensamiento desafiando a cualesquier vientos y mareas.
					
					  Como resultado de la dinamica lucha por aprender el modo de lucha y trabajo del EPC, librada bajo la guia del Songun del Dirigente, se establecieron en todo el partido la ferrea disciplina y orden revolucionarios y se desarrollaron la labor ideologica y los demas trabajos politicos del partido al estilo de la ofensiva y como los que se hacen al pie de la trinchera.
					
					  Todas las organizaciones, funcionarios y militantes del partido deben glorificar para siempre las inmortales hazanas de guia del Dirigente acumuladas en la causa de construccion del partido de la epoca del Songun y cumplir satisfactoriamente su mision y papel de vanguardia en la actual ofensiva general para la victoria final de edificacion de una gran potencia prospera.
